court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN SC 865/2017 OF ASSISTANT SESSIONS COURT, THALASSERY CRIME NO.115/2009 OF Kolavallur Police Station, Kannur PETITIONER/1ST ACCUSED: MUHAMMED @ MAMMONHI, AGED 30 YEARS, S/O.ABDULLA, RESIDIN
full_text: pret bz 2020/KER/538 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON TUESDAY, THE 07TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 17TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8732 OF 2019 (B) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN SC 865/2017 OF ASSISTANT SESSIONS COURT, THALASSERY CRIME NO.115/2009 OF Kolavallur Police Station, Kannur PETITIONER/1ST ACCUSED: MUHAMMED @ MAMMONHI, AGED 30 YEARS, S/O.ABDULLA, RESIDING AT MATHIYAMBATH HOUSE, THRIPPANGOTTUR P.O., KADAVATHOOR, KANNUR DISTRICT- 670676. BY ADVS. SRI.P.V.ANOOP SRI .M.P.PRIYESHKUMAR RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANT & STATE: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI- 682031. 2 SANEESH, AGED 31 YEARS, S/O.SUNNY, PUTHUKKUDI HOUSE, PANOOR (PO), THALASSERY TALUK, KANNUR DISTRICT, PIN- 670692. RL BY SRI.RAMESH CHAND, PP R2 BY ADV. K.V.SREERAJ OTHER PRESENT: THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Crl1.M.C.No.8732 of 2019 > 2020/KER/S38 ORDER Dated this the 7th day of January 2020 The petitioner is the 15* accused in S.C.No.865/2017 on the file of the Assistant Sessions Court, Thalassery, for having allegedly committed the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 324, 308 and 427 read with Section 149 of I.P.C. along with some other accused. The petitioner was absconding and the trial proceeded against the co- accused, who according to the petitioner, was found to be not guilty and acquitted. The only injured is the 2 respondent herein, who has appeared through a Counsel and has filed an affidavit stating that the matter has been amicably settled and he has no existing grievance against the petitioner. A report has been filed by the investigating officer through the Senior Public Prosecutor to that effect. The petitioner does not have any criminal antecedents and no public interest is involved and the co-accused were acquitted. Under the circumstances, no purpose will be served by proceeding against the petitioner. REae ee Bee Crl1.M.C.No.8732 of 2019 2020/KER/S38 3 In the result, the Crl.M.C. is allowed and the entire proceedings in S.C.No.865/2017 on the file of the Assistant Sessions Court, Thalassery, stands quashed under Section 482 of Cr.P.C. and the petitioner is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON akr JUDGE mee eB Elz nl aH Cri.M.C.No.8732 of 2019 2020/KER/538 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S / S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO. 115/2009 OF KOLAVALLOOR POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE B COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 115/2009 OF KOLAVALLOOR POLICE STATION WHICH IS NOW PENDING AGAINST THE PETITIONER AS S.C.NO. 865/2017 ON THE FILE OF THE ASSISTANT SESSIONS COURT, THALASSERY. ANNEXURE C AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 07.11.2019.
